made_by: Made with ♥ by Eduardo Bortolotti L.
home_subtitle: Choose one of the available tools to start.
affinity_card_desc: Finds relevant blogs and media for your topic.
hybrid_card_desc: Scans any website to find contact emails.
projects_card_desc: Organize your work, manage keywords, and review saved media.
hybrid_subtitle: Uncover contact information from any website.
hybrid_placeholder: Enter the website URL to investigate...
affinity_subtitle: Discover relevant media outlets based on real SEO data.
search_type_tooltip_content:
Top Authority: Looks for highly authoritative sites on page 1 of search results.
Established: Digs deeper (pages 2-3) for specialized blogs and niche media.
Rising Stars: Searches further (pages 4-5) to uncover new or less-known sites.
login_subtitle: Please log in to access the tools.
settings_subtitle: Manage your preferences and API keys.
api_keys_subtitle: This feature will be enabled in a future update.
projects_subtitle: Manage your outreach campaigns and keywords.
ai_explainer_desc: Use our AI feature to analyze your project's URL. It will scan the content and ask Gemini to identify the most relevant keywords and suggest new long-tail opportunities for your content strategy.
step_B_title: Step B: Analyze Text with AI
project_name_placeholder: e.g., Launch Campaign for Client X
no_projects: No projects found. Create one to get started!
select_project_alert: Please set a project as active first from the 'Projects' page.
search_warn_message: [WARN] Search finished, but some keywords failed. Found {count} results from successful searches.
hybrid_scraper_lang_explainer: Select the target website's language to improve the accuracy of finding contact pages.
